Title: CUME_DIST()
Description: CUME_DIST() 计算一个值在一组值中的累积分布。请注意，你需要在 CUME_DIST() 后使用 ORDER BY 子句对该组中的值进行排序。否则，此函数将不会返回预期值。

WITH RECURSIVE cte(n) AS (
    SELECT 1
    UNION
    SELECT
        n+2
    FROM
        cte
    WHERE
        n<6
)
SELECT
    *,
    CUME_DIST() OVER(ORDER BY n)
FROM
    cte;
Examples:
WITH RECURSIVE cte(n) AS (
    SELECT 1
    UNION
    SELECT
        n+2
    FROM
        cte
    WHERE
        n<6
)
SELECT
    *,
    CUME_DIST() OVER(ORDER BY n)
FROM
    cte;
